QuestData.Title: Improvised Ammunition
QuestData.Description: I've got another job for you.$B$BThe dragon cannons we depend on to keep the thicker swathes of mantid back are running low on ammo. The camp's cannoneers developed an improvised explosive that's made from the globe seeds down the western ridge.$B$BThey dispatched a couple initiates to bring some back hours ago, but have heard nothing from them. I want to send someone a bit more capable to make sure that this gets taken care of.$B$BAre you my $gman:woman; for this?
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 16 Volatile Dread Orbs from the Ambermarsh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Back even more quickly than expected. Did you bring the seeds?
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to have a $c that I can count on.
